conbody.p: UDP to Kafka originovervieworiginsUDP to KafkaThe UDP to Kafka origin reads messages from one or more UDP ports and writes each message directly to Kafka.

UDP to Kafka can read syslog messages, Netflow messages from NetFlow Version 5, and collectd messages. When you configure UDP Source, you specify the UDP ports to use, Kafka configuration information, and advanced properties such as the maximum number of write requests.
You can add Kafka configuration properties and enable Kafka security as needed.
